name: Bio-Ship
description:
Destroy the enemy ships without dying.  There are 3 unlockable weapons:

Minigun 

An inaccurate and weak gun, but its high rate of fire makes it extremely forgiving

-Tap SPACE to take out (if SPACE is held down, the minigun will be spun up when it is taken out)

-Once the minigun is out, hold SPACE to spin up/fire

-Release SPACE while it is firing to put away

Possible Upgrades: Rate of fire, Damage and Accuracy (Red upgrades)

Cannon

A precise and powerful weapon that can be devastating in the hands of a skilled user

-Tap Z to take out

-When out, tap Z to fire

-Press X or SPACE to put away

Possible Upgrades: Rate of fire, Damage and Explosion Size (Green Upgrades)

Rocket Launcher

A fast-firing launcher that shoots slow, but decently powerful, rockets.  They will detonate if they are close enough to enemies, even if they do not collide.

-Tap X to fire one rocket

-Hold X to fire multiple rockets

Possible Upgrades: Rate of Fire, Damage, Explosion Size, Initial Rocket Speed, Rocket Acceleration (Magenta Upgrades)

The blue upgrade increases the damage of explosions.

Upgrades with 3 dots increase rate of fire

Upgrades with a bunch of lines radiating from a point increase Damage

Upgrades with a vaguely ring-shaped cloud increase splash size

For the rocket launcher, the arrow that tapers at the end increases rocket acceleration  and the arrow that is straight increases rocket base speed.
